translation.sdh_Arab: چۊ کاغەز مووسیقای ئیمە.
translation.eng_Latn: like our music paper.

translation.sdh_Arab: تا ئەو جی ک بیتا، سەقفی نەۊ
translation.eng_Latn: wherever possible roofs had been dispensed with.

translation.sdh_Arab: داشتم خنکیام، وە مدوو ئەو چشتێ ک ئەو مەیمۊنە ستۊدنە ناو قۆڕگم
translation.eng_Latn: I was almost choked with the filthy stuff the monkey had crammed down my throat.

translation.sdh_Arab: م بات ئێ قەزییە ژە ۋیر بۋەرم
translation.eng_Latn: I'm going to have to call it off.

translation.sdh_Arab: جوور یەێ پیاگ خاس، ئەمانێ وە ئەوڕەسین خوار و سووک
translation.eng_Latn: as a well meaning man, but of a low contemptible understanding.

translation.sdh_Arab: تمشای براگانم بکە
translation.eng_Latn: look at my brothers.

translation.sdh_Arab: ۋەلێ فرە ۋەی محەل نەنام
translation.eng_Latn: but I didn't give much heed to it.

translation.sdh_Arab: وە بوون ڕووح ئەرزانێ گ نیشان دام وە هەر جوورە ناوێ چڕیادەم.
translation.eng_Latn: he calling me all sorts of names for the base spirit I evinced.

translation.sdh_Arab: ناوێ بار، هاتێ ڕۊمەت شاریاگێ بێ کاریگەر بکەی.
translation.eng_Latn: mention it, maybe, so as to offset the look of its being hidden

translation.sdh_Arab: ک دۊنم فرە ئەوبانم کارێگەرە
translation.eng_Latn: which I consider quite beneath me.

translation.sdh_Arab: تا بتۊەنێ جواو ڕەد بیەی و بۊشێ کگشت چشت تەمام بۊە
translation.eng_Latn: so that he could tell her no, that everything was over

translation.sdh_Arab: بات چییێ ۋەت بیشم
translation.eng_Latn: I must tell you something.

translation.sdh_Arab: وە شیوەی مرۆڤایەتی ئاماژە وە دەر کرد.
translation.eng_Latn: she humanely pointed out the door.

translation.sdh_Arab: پەت زەنگەگە دڕی، لە ناخ دڵەو چڕیەو خزمەتکارەگە.
translation.eng_Latn: broke the bell rope, called for the servant with all her might
